ending:godling_negotiated_cautious.title: A Benevolent Guardian
ending:godling_negotiated_cautious.text: Your cautious approach allowed you to negotiate. The godling’s power is now a part of you, but not its will. You are a new kind of deity, one that serves as a guardian rather than a conqueror. You have become a benevolent god.

ending:godling_slain_cautious.title: A Mortal Legend
ending:godling_slain_cautious.text: Your morality allowed you to sever the connection, but at a cost. The godling’s essence is scattered, its power now your own. But you are forever changed, a mortal with a divine scar, and you have become a mortal legend.

ending:godling_slain_bold.title: A Predatory Tyrant
ending:godling_slain_bold.text: Your boldness allowed you to defeat the godling. Its power is now a part of you, but so is its predatory will. You are a conqueror, and your new godhood is based on conquest. You have become a predatory tyrant.

ending:godling_dominated_bold.title: A Tyrant
ending:godling_dominated_bold.text: Your boldness allowed you to dominate the godling. It is now a slave to your will, and its power is your own. You have become an unstoppable force, a puppet master of the divine. You have become a tyrant.

ending:godling_absorbed_dark.title: The Ultimate Trickster
ending:godling_absorbed_dark.text: Your darkness allowed you to absorb the godling entirely. Its will is your own, and its power is your birthright. You are not a godling, you are the god, and the world is your toy. You have become the ultimate trickster.

ending:godling_obliterated_dark.title: The Lost God
ending:godling_obliterated_dark.text: Your darkness allowed you to obliterate the godling. But in doing so, you have lost all sense of self. Your mind is a vortex of chaotic energy, and you are lost forever in the shadows of what could have been. You have become the lost god.

ending:predatory_cautious.title: A Benevolent Predator
ending:predatory_cautious.text: You chose to merge carefully, retaining your identity. You are a new kind of deity, one that serves as a guardian rather than a conqueror. But your caution has a cost, and your power will slowly consume you. You have become a benevolent predator.

ending:trickster_cautious.title: A Benevolent Trickster
ending:trickster_cautious.text: You chose to merge carefully, retaining your identity. You are a new kind of deity, one that serves as a guardian rather than a conqueror. But your caution has a cost, and your power will slowly consume you. You have become a benevolent trickster.

ending:predatory_bold.title: A Predatory God
ending:predatory_bold.text: You chose to merge boldly, retaining your identity. You are a new kind of deity, one that serves as a conqueror rather than a guardian. But your boldness has a cost, and your power will slowly consume you. You have become a predatory god.

ending:trickster_bold.title: A Trickster God
ending:trickster_bold.text: You chose to merge boldly, retaining your identity. You are a new kind of deity, one that serves as a conqueror rather than a guardian. But your boldness has a cost, and your power will slowly consume you. You have become a trickster god.

ending:predatory_dark.title: The Ultimate Predator
ending:predatory_dark.text: Your darkness allowed you to merge with the godling entirely. Its will is your own, and its power is your birthright. You are not a godling, you are the god, and the world is your toy. You have become the ultimate predator.

ending:trickster_dark.title: The Ultimate Trickster
ending:trickster_dark.text: Your darkness allowed you to merge with the godling entirely. Its will is your own, and its power is your birthright. You are not a godling, you are the god, and the world is your toy. You have become the ultimate trickster.
